text: Have you seen any good movies lately?
What's your favorite movie of all time?
Do you prefer watching movies at home or in the theater?
responses: I just saw the latest Marvel movie and it was amazing! How about you?
My all-time favorite movie is The Shawshank Redemption. What about you?
I prefer watching movies at home because it's more comfortable and convenient. How about you?

text: Have you been on any good dates recently?

responses: I went on a really fun date last week where we went to a cooking class together. How about you?

text: What's your favorite type of cuisine?

responses: I love Italian food, especially pizza and pasta. How about you?
I prefer cooking at home because it's healthier and more affordable. How about you?

text: What do you like to do for fun?
